org.forgerock.openidm.crypto

Class SaltedSHA256FieldStorageScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.crypto.FieldStorageSchemeImpl
      • org.forgerock.openidm.crypto.SaltedSHA256FieldStorageScheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldStorageScheme

    public class SaltedSHA256FieldStorageScheme
extends FieldStorageSchemeImpl
    This class defines a field storage scheme based on the 256-bit SHA-2 algorithm defined in FIPS 180-2.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SaltedSHA256FieldStorageScheme()
      Creates a new instance of this field storage scheme.
